derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in sense 2): via Latin from Greek tainia 'band, ribbon'

means.word_mean: 1. a narrow headband or strip of ribbon worn as a headband
2. tapeworms parasitic in humans which uses the pig as its intermediate host
